facts: Contractor agreed to build house by December 1
Contract specified time was of the essence
Owner had to rent temporary housing for 2.5 months
asp_facts: contract(c1). parties(c1, owner, contractor). subject_matter(c1, construction). breach(c1, yes). breach_material(c1, yes). time_of_essence(c1, yes). breach_type(c1, late_performance). delay_days(c1, 76). substantial_performance(c1, no). damages_caused(c1, yes). non_breaching_discharged(c1, yes).
question: Is the owner discharged from the contract?
rationale: When time is of the essence and the breaching party fails to perform on time, it constitutes a material breach. A material breach discharges the non-breaching party from further performance and entitles them to damages.
